entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:37 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:37 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 7:37 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
